en: You say that you're afraid of being disliked by other people, but you have some people that you dislike yourself, don't you? Arithmetically speaking, there are an equal number of people who you don't like that don't like you back. I'm not saying that if you end your dislike of someone, someone else will stop disliking you as well; it's just that you can't change the fact that if you dislike someone, then someone else dislikes you as well. Your life will go much smoother if you just give up and accept that truth.
ja: 人に嫌われるのが怖いって言うけどさ、君も苦手な人いるでしょ。数学的に言って、同じ数の人が君のこと苦手なんだよ。これは別に、嫌いな人をなくせば誰からも嫌われなくなるって言いたいんじゃなくて、単純に君に嫌いな人がいるように誰かに嫌われることがあっても仕方ないってこと。そこを諦めればもっと気楽に生きられるんじゃないかな。
